title: Masala Omelette
description: Fluffy omelette with tomatoes, onions, green chilies.
steps: Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Pour eggs, cook, fold, and serve.

title: Veg Fried Rice
description: Quick wok-tossed rice with mixed veggies.
steps: Heat oil, sauté garlic and veggies.
Add cooked rice and soy sauce, toss.
